mapper.select: select m.* from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role_permission rp on ur.role_id = rp.role_id left join sys_permission_menu pm on pm.permission_id = rp.permission_id left join sys_menu m on pm.menu_id= m.menu_id where u.user_id=#{userId};
